description: Peanuts cartoon drawing for June 4, 1972 Sunday newspaper syndicated comic strip
image_copyright: Â© Estate Charles M. Schulz. All rights reserved.
inscription:
Signature; Date; Inscriptions

Printed inscription in black ink on white paper, pasted down within the first panel: [Peanuts / featuring / \"Good ol\' / Charlie Brown\" / by Schulz].

Inscribed in black ink along top margin: [(arrow) 13 3/4 \" WIDE (arrow)].

Inscribed in black ink within the fifth panel: [6-4]

Printed inscription in black ink on paper tag affixed vertically within the fifth panel: [Tm. Reg. U.S. Pat. Off. - All rights reserved / (c) 1972 by United Feature Synduicate, Inc.]

Inscribed in black ink, LRC [611]; and in red ink, LRC: [w 1507].
medium: Pen and black ink, with collage on illustration cardboard
signed: Signed in black ink, in LR panel, vertically: [Schulz]
title: Peanuts, Featuring "Good ol' Charlie Brown"
